attr.title: Minit
attr.desc: Minit is a peculiar little adventure played sixty seconds at a time. Journey outside the comfort of your home to help unusual folk, uncover countless secrets, and overcome dangerous foes, all in hopes of lifting a rather unfortunate curse that ends each day after just one minute.
attr.desc_md: Minit is a peculiar little adventure played sixty seconds at a time. Journey outside the comfort of your home to help unusual folk, uncover countless secrets, and overcome dangerous foes, all in hopes of lifting a rather unfortunate curse that ends each day after just one minute.
attr.inst: Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/609490/Minit/ . Copy data.win, all .ogg and all .csv files to /ports/minit/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/609490/Minit/). Copy data.win, all .ogg and all .csv files to /ports/minit/gamedata
